name: SQL driver library for 4D
short_description: lib4d_sql is a C library providing the required functions (connect, prepare, execute, ...) to write a SQL client for 4D databases. It uses the public 4D SQL protocol wich is supported by 4D products since... the version 11. It is already used by the PDO_
